entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump 1920’s- N. IRL. the Crown sent the Black & Tans. Spanish flu was still out there.
2020’s- USA. the White House sent the NG. Covid19 is still out there.
Wear your fucking masks😷
And don’t forget- humvees don’t have keys😎
